name: ouroborus
description: This module provides a way to do secondary indexes on autobase hyperbees. This is done by creating an api similar to SimpleAutobee to support hyperbee operations w/ autobase, but also providing simple ways to watch key ranges and derive values base on changes to those ranges as well.
author: Sean Zellmer <sean@lejeunerenard.com> (http://lejeunerenard.com/)
